'''NetEase, Inc.''' is a Chinese internet and video game corporation, known for handling ports of international video games, such as ''{{Wikipedia|World of Warcraft}}'', ''{{Wikipedia|StarCraft II}}'' and ''{{Wikipedia|Overwatch (video game)|Overwatch}}''. In 2017, they developed the [[China Edition]] of ''[[Minecraft]]''.
